verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

On the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> shalt thou set <S%H6965>up<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>.
And thou shalt <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H8033>therein<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony<s%>, and <S%H5526>cover<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> with the <S%H6532>vail<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H935>bring<s%> in the <S%H7979>table<s%>, and set in <S%H6186>order<s%> the things that are to be set in <S%H6187>order<s%> upon it; and thou shalt <S%H935>bring<s%> in the <S%H4501>candlestick<s%>, and <S%H5927>light<s%> the <S%H5216>lamps<s%> thereof.

And thou shalt <S%H5414>set<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> for the <S%H7004>incense<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony<s%>, and <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H4539>hanging<s%> of the <S%H6607>door<s%> to the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H5414>set<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>.
And thou shalt <S%H5414>set<s%> the <S%H3595>laver<s%> between the <S%H168>tent<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%> and the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, and shalt <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> therein.
And thou shalt set <S%H7760>up<s%> the <S%H2691>court<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>, and hang <S%H5414>up<s%> the <S%H4539>hanging<s%> at the <S%H2691>court<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%>, and <S%H4886>anoint<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>, and all that is therein, and shalt <S%H6942>hallow<s%> it, and all the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> thereof: and it shall be <S%H6944>holy<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H4886>anoint<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%>, and all his <S%H3627>vessels<s%>, and <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%>: and it shall be an <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%>.
And thou shalt <S%H4886>anoint<s%> the <S%H3595>laver<s%> and his <S%H3653>foot<s%>, and <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> it.

And thou shalt <S%H7126>bring<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> unto the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>, and <S%H7364>wash<s%> them with <S%H4325>water<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H3847>put<s%> upon <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%>, and <S%H4886>anoint<s%> him, and <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> him; that he may minister unto me in the priest's <S%H3547>office<s%>.
And thou shalt <S%H7126>bring<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and <S%H3847>clothe<s%> them with <S%H3801>coats<s%>:

And thou shalt <S%H4886>anoint<s%> them, as thou didst <S%H4886>anoint<s%> their <S%H1>father<s%>, that they may minister unto me in the priest's <S%H3547>office<s%>: for their <S%H4888>anointing<s%> shall surely be an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H3550>priesthood<s%> throughout their <S%H1755>generations<s%>.
Thus <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>: according to all that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him, so <S%H6213>did<s%> he.

¶ And it came to pass in the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> in the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%>, on the <S%H259>first<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month<s%>, that the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> was reared <S%H6965>up<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> reared <S%H6965>up<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>, and <S%H5414>fastened<s%> his <S%H134>sockets<s%>, and set <S%H7760>up<s%> the <S%H7175>boards<s%> thereof, and <S%H5414>put<s%> in the <S%H1280>bars<s%> thereof, and reared <S%H6965>up<s%> his <S%H5982>pillars<s%>.

And he spread <S%H6566>abroad<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> over the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>, and <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H4372>covering<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> <S%H4605>above<s%> upon it; as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.

¶ And he <S%H3947>took<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H5715>testimony<s%> into the <S%H727>ark<s%>, and <S%H7760>set<s%> the <S%H905>staves<s%> on the <S%H727>ark<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> the mercy <S%H3727>seat<s%> <S%H4605>above<s%> upon the <S%H727>ark<s%>:

And he <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> into the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>, and set <S%H7760>up<s%> the <S%H6532>vail<s%> of the <S%H4539>covering<s%>, and <S%H5526>covered<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony<s%>; as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.

¶ And he <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H7979>table<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>, upon the <S%H3409>side<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> <S%H6828>northward<s%>, <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H6532>vail<s%>.
And he <S%H6187>set<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> in <S%H6186>order<s%> upon it <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.

¶ And he <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H4501>candlestick<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>, over <S%H5227>against<s%> the <S%H7979>table<s%>, on the <S%H3409>side<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> <S%H5045>southward<s%>.
And he <S%H5927>lighted<s%> the <S%H5216>lamps<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.
¶ And he <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H4196>altar<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H6532>vail<s%>:
And he <S%H6999>burnt<s%> <S%H5561>sweet<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> thereon; as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.
¶ And he set <S%H7760>up<s%> the <S%H4539>hanging<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>.

And he <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> by the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>, and <S%H5927>offered<s%> upon it the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> and the meat <S%H4503>offering<s%>; as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.

¶ And he <S%H7760>set<s%> the <S%H3595>laver<s%> between the <S%H168>tent<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%> and the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> there, to <S%H7364>wash<s%> withal.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H7364>washed<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> and their <S%H7272>feet<s%> thereat:

When they <S%H935>went<s%> into the <S%H168>tent<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>, and when they came <S%H7126>near<s%> unto the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, they <S%H7364>washed<s%>; as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.

And he reared <S%H6965>up<s%> the <S%H2691>court<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> and the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, and set <S%H5414>up<s%> the <S%H4539>hanging<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%>. So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3615>finished<s%> the <S%H4399>work<s%>.

¶ Then a <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H3680>covered<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>, and the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> was not <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H168>tent<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>, because the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H7931>abode<s%> thereon, and the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>.

And when the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> was taken <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H5921>from<s%> over the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> went <S%H5265>onward<s%> in all their <S%H4550>journeys<s%>:
But if the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> were not taken <S%H5927>up<s%>, then they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> not till the <S%H3117>day<s%> that it was taken <S%H5927>up<s%>.

For the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was upon the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> by <S%H3119>day<s%>, and <S%H784>fire<s%> was on it by <S%H3915>night<s%>, in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of all the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, throughout all their <S%H4550>journeys<s%>.
